PRERELEASE_MODE.title: Use prerelease mode
PRERELEASE_MODE.description: Show in-progress features for testing & internal use

OT_PD_DISABLE_MODULE_RESTRICTIONS.title: Disable module placement restrictions
OT_PD_DISABLE_MODULE_RESTRICTIONS.description: Turn off all restrictions on module placement and related pipette crash guidance.

OT_PD_ALLOW_ALL_TIPRACKS.title: Allow all tip rack options
OT_PD_ALLOW_ALL_TIPRACKS.description: Enable selection of all tip racks for each pipette.

OT_PD_ENABLE_COMMENT.title: Enable comment step
OT_PD_ENABLE_COMMENT.description: You can add comments anywhere between timeline steps.

OT_PD_ENABLE_RETURN_TIP.title: Enable return tip
OT_PD_ENABLE_RETURN_TIP.description: You can choose which tip to pick up and where to drop tip.

OT_PD_ENABLE_HOT_KEYS_DISPLAY.title: Timeline editing guidance
OT_PD_ENABLE_HOT_KEYS_DISPLAY.description: Show information about working with steps next to the protocol timeline

OT_PD_ENABLE_REACT_SCAN.title: Enable React Scan
OT_PD_ENABLE_REACT_SCAN.description: Enable React Scan support for components rendering check

OT_PD_ENABLE_TIMELINE_SCRUBBER.title: Enable timeline scrubber
OT_PD_ENABLE_TIMELINE_SCRUBBER.description: See the protocol timeline visualization in overview

OT_PD_ENABLE_PYTHON_EXPORT.title: Enable exporting python
OT_PD_ENABLE_PYTHON_EXPORT.description: Enables the ability to export python for pd/python interop

OT_PD_ENABLE_MULTIPLE_TEMPS_OT2.title: Allow two temperature modules on OT-2
OT_PD_ENABLE_MULTIPLE_TEMPS_OT2.description: This experimental setting may cause collisions, and Opentrons will not be responsible for any damage resulting from its use.
